review: Brilliant doctor,Master in his field,very caring, cheerful and explains the patient concern very carefully and decent manner.Loads of experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Initially the junior Doctor asked to get xray done. After waiting for 1 hour (post-x-ray) Dr. L. Tomar said there is no use of X Ray and to get MRI!

Said the reason for pain could be anything (bursa, meniscus or ligament), and possibly to try physiotherapy and come back after 10 days. Finally, when asked what to tell the physiotherapist, he said they know their job ******

Not friendly and not willing to explain enough and have a conversation. On being told that I have a related medical issue, he just said I should not be doing anything for fitness *****. 

All in all, very bad experience, not at all recommended.
Good experience to meet doctor and I hope for better treatment for my son.  Dr. Advice after reports will come

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: L Tomar doesn't believe is listening to the patient. He is always in a hurry and not available over phone if case of emergencies. I won't recommend this doctor to anyone.
